response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would be a significant asset to you. We are offering this remarkable item at a special price of $900,000. This is an opportunity to secure a piece that is worth $1,000,000 to you at a competitive rate. Should you have any questions or wish to proceed, please let us know. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 900000}
